job_details.Vacaturetitel: Staff Software Engineer, Backend, ML Security
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Staff Software Engineer to join our Threat Defense and Response team and lead the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. As a Staff Software Engineer, you are not only role models, but also empathic leaders. You are humble teachers, technically mentoring passionate engineers while also delivering uniquely challenging projects. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and
   engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What the Candidate Will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance software platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional software engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior software engineers

   About the Team:

   Our mission is to protect, defend, and secure Uber's products, infrastructure and data by building highly available, scalable and extensible security platforms and services. We are focused on proactively identifying and remediating security risks as well as swiftly detecting and mitigating security incidents. In the ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity, we continuously adapt and evolve our defenses in order to always stay one step ahead of potential threats.
job_details.full_text:
Staff Software Engineer, Backend, ML Security

We are seeking a talented and experienced Staff Software Engineer to join our Threat Defense and Response team and lead the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. As a Staff Software Engineer, you are not only role models, but also empathic leaders. You are humble teachers, technically mentoring passionate engineers while also delivering uniquely challenging projects. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and
   engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What the Candidate Will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance software platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional software engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior software engineers

   About the Team:

   Our mission is to protect, defend, and secure Uber's products, infrastructure and data by building highly available, scalable and extensible security platforms and services. We are focused on proactively identifying and remediating security risks as well as swiftly detecting and mitigating security incidents. In the ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity, we continuously adapt and evolve our defenses in order to always stay one step ahead of potential threats.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of AI-powered security platforms, leveraging ML/GenAI for threat defense and response. While it mentions software engineering, the core focus is on applying AI models and algorithms to security problems, building scalable solutions, and enhancing cyber defense capabilities. This aligns more closely with the 'ML Engineer' profile's focus on data-driven algorithms for prediction and automation in a production environment, rather than the 'GenAI Engineer' profile's emphasis on LLMs and generative models for user-facing applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven' directly indicates the use and application of AI models and algorithms for a specific task.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance software platform and services for Uber's cyber defense' describes core software engineering activities focused on building and scaling platforms and services.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance software platform and services for Uber's cyber defense

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions' shows the need to understand domain-specific needs and translate them into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cross-functional software engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions' indicates working with other engineering teams to deliver complete solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional software engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement' are standard software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense' implies building and maintaining systems that can handle large loads and operate reliably in production, which is a key aspect of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense

architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions
